mapper.select: select to_char(p.startprice,'999,999,999') startprice,p.status, p.procount,p.product, p.proimg, m.memname, to_char(p.price,'999,999,999') price, to_char(p.enddate,'yy/MM/dd hh24:mi') enddate,p.pronum from product p, member m where p.prowriter = m.memnum order by pronum desc

select to_char(p.startprice,'999,999,999') startprice, p.status, to_char(p.prostep,'999,999,999') prostep, p.pronum, p.product, p.proimg, m.memname, to_char(p.price,'999,999,999') price, to_char(p.enddate,'yy/MM/dd hh24:mi') enddate from product p, member m where p.prowriter = m.memnum and p.pronum=#{pronum}
mapper.update: update product set enddate=enddate+1/24 where pronum=#{pronum}
mapper.select: select to_char(enddate,'yy-MM-dd hh24:mi') enddate from product where pronum=#{pronum}
mapper.update: update product set price=#{bidprice} where pronum=#{bidpronum}
update product set procount=(procount+1) where pronum=#{bidpronum}
mapper.select: select bidnum,bidmem,bidpronum,bidprice,m.memname bidmemname ,b.biddate from bidder b, member m where bidpronum=#{bidpronum} and b.bidmem = m.memnum order by bidnum desc
